ValidationRule.description: SF-93 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("[A-Z][0-9][A-Z][ ][0-9][A-Z][0-9]") or ("[A-Z][0-9][A-Z][ ][0-9][A-Z]"). Example: A9A 9A9 or A9A 9A
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s )), ISPICKVAL( Construction_Site_Address__CountryCode__s , "CA") ), NOT( OR( REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][0-9][A-Z][ ][0-9][A-Z][0-9]")), REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][0-9][A-Z][ ][0-9][A-Z]")) ) ), FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Opportunity_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should consist of an uppercase letter, a number, an uppercase letter followed by a space, a number, an uppercase letter and optional number. Example: A9A 9A9 or A9A 9A
